rooms.name: PendulumsLab
description: You are in Pendulum's Lab, where you see a Time Machine and a disgruntled scientist.
You are able to travel east to go through the Time Machine.
Use the "trade" command to find out what the scientist needs.

visibleItems.itemDescription: This seems to be the power source for a large machine.
This seems to be the power source for a large machine.
This seems to be a used piece of gum. Why did I pick this up again?

itemRequestDialogue: Could you help me find the power source for this machine.
Once you've found it, use the "take [insert item name]" command to pick it up.
Then, use the "trade [insert item name]" command to give it to me.
Once you pick up the item, you may also use the "inspect [insert object name]" command.
This will provide you with additional details about an item which may prove useful.
Finally, you may use the "inventory" command to see all the items in your current inventory.
requestCompletedDialogue: Thank you so much. I've made a horrible mistake.
There was a malfunction with my machine, and I am worried that time as a whole has been messed up.
Could you use this machine, now that it's fixed, to travel to the future and see if everything's alright?
Here is an identification card that should allow you to access the Time Machine.
Use the "go [insert direction name]" command to travel east through the Time Machine.

missingItem.itemDescription: This seems to be the power source for a large machine.

rewardItem.itemDescription: This seems to be an identification card from Pendulum's Lab.

itemsNeededToProgress.itemDescription: This seems to be an identification card from Pendulum's Lab.

rooms.name: DestroyedFuture
description: You find yourself in a barren wasteland, with no signs of life except for someone who looks oddly familiar.
To the west, you see the Time Machine you entered through.
To the north, you see a portal leading to a beautiful utopia.
To the east, you see a portal leading to the Viking Era.

visibleItems.itemDescription: This pair of barely usable glasses seems to belong to someone VERY old.

itemRequestDialogue: I have something very important to tell you, but could you hand me my glasses first.
They should be somewhere around here.
requestCompletedDialogue: Thank you. As I was saying, I have something important to tell you.
I am you but from fifty years in the future.
What you are seeing now is the reality we will live in if the past is not repaired.
A malfunction from the time machine caused various objects throughout history to be misplaced.
As a result, our world is in chaos. You must navigate the past and return objects to their rightful place.
Here is a time travelling stopwatch which should allow you to travel through the portal to the east.
Once all the historical artifacts have been properly restored to their owners, return here.
Make sure to bring back proof that the misplaced objects have been restored.
You should then be able to travel through the portal to the north to reach our restored future.

missingItem.itemDescription: This pair of barely usable glasses seems to belong to someone VERY old.

rewardItem.itemDescription: This mysterious stopwatch can be used to travel through portals to the past and future.

itemsNeededToProgress.itemDescription: This seems to be an identification card from Pendulum's Lab.
This drink has a distinct aroma of honey and fruit.
This seems to be an intricately crafted writing device with an accompanying ink pot.
This seems to be a headdress made by connecting branches and leaves.
These seem to be tropical nuts that grow in warm climate.
This is just a plain, old ball of snow. I wonder how it hasn't melted yet.
This seems to be a vibrant and colorful mask that somehow fits you perfectly. Who would've thought!
This sketchbook contains hundreds of ideas for new machines. The possibilities really are endless.
This mysterious stopwatch can be used to travel through portals to the past and future.

rooms.name: VikingEra
description: You reach a rocky shore in the midst of a powerful storm.
You see someone who seems to be a Viking frantically searching through his ship's inventory.
To the west, you see the portal you traveled through.
To the north, you see a portal leading to Graff House.
To the east, you see a portal leading to a trading post in the Mali Empire.
To the south, you see a portal leading to a city in the Aztec Empire.

visibleItems.itemDescription: This seems to be a masterfully crafted vase of pure gold.
These goggles seem sturdier than one would usually find at a department store.

itemRequestDialogue: Have you seen my lucky pendant by chance.
I can't find it, and I certainly don't plan to travel in this weather without it!
I'll have a nice reward in store for you if you can help me in my search.
requestCompletedDialogue: Ah, there it is! Here is your reward as promised.
Here's a mug of mead, it'll last you a long while out here. Make sure not to lose it!

missingItem.itemDescription: This gold-encrusted amulet seems very old. How did it end up here?

rewardItem.itemDescription: This drink has a distinct aroma of honey and fruit.

itemsNeededToProgress.itemDescription: This mysterious stopwatch can be used to travel through portals to the past and future.
This mysterious stopwatch can be used to travel through portals to the past and future.
This mysterious stopwatch can be used to travel through portals to the past and future.
This mysterious stopwatch can be used to travel through portals to the past and future.

rooms.name: GraffHouse
description: You find yourself outside of a red-brick building.
In front of the building, you see a man in a powdered wig pacing back and forth.
To the east, you see a portal to the city of Delphi in Ancient Greece.
To the south, you see a portal to the Viking Era.

visibleItems.itemDescription: This seems to be some kind of sound device.
This seems to be a bag filled with white blocks of salt. Wonder what they're used for!

itemRequestDialogue: Hello there. Have you seen a lengthy document along this street.
It concerns gravely important matters concerning the state of our nation.
I would greatly appreciate any help you could offer.
requestCompletedDialogue: Oh, splendid! How could I ever repay you?
Oh, I know! Here is one of my most prized possessions: a quill pen passed down from my father.

missingItem.itemDescription: This seems to be an initial draft of something called the "Declaration of Independence".

rewardItem.itemDescription: This seems to be an intricately crafted writing device with an accompanying ink pot.

itemsNeededToProgress.itemDescription: This mysterious stopwatch can be used to travel through portals to the past and future.
This mysterious stopwatch can be used to travel through portals to the past and future.

rooms.name: AncientGreece
description: You find yourself inside of a giant white temple.
In the middle of the room stands a woman, looking pensively at the brazier in front of her.
To the west, you see a portal to Graff House.
To the South, you see a portal to a trading port in the Mali Empire.

visibleItems.itemDescription: These goggles seem sturdier than one would usually find at a department store.
This gold-encrusted amulet seems very old. How did it end up here?

itemRequestDialogue: Welcome, traveler. I am missing an especially auspicious decoration.
This missing piece of furniture is quite ornate and expensive, and I would hate to have lost it.
Come back here once you have found the item and I will reward you generously.
requestCompletedDialogue: Well done. Here is a laurel wreath in exchange for your hard work.
This wreath symbolizes triumph and bravery. May you wear it well.

missingItem.itemDescription: This seems to be a masterfully crafted vase of pure gold.

rewardItem.itemDescription: This seems to be a headdress made by connecting branches and leaves.

itemsNeededToProgress.itemDescription: This mysterious stopwatch can be used to travel through portals to the past and future.
This mysterious stopwatch can be used to travel through portals to the past and future.

rooms.name: MaliEmpire
description: You find yourself in a busy trading port in the Mali Empire.
The streets are filled with caravans, but one particular trading merchant stands out to you.
To the west, you see a portal to the Viking Era.
To the north, you see a portal to the city of Delphi in Ancient Greece.
To the south, you see a portal to Mount Everest.

visibleItems.itemDescription: This seems to be an initial draft of something called the "Declaration of Independence".
This seems to be a small section of a large piece of stone craftwork.

itemRequestDialogue: Hello fellow traveler. I desperately need to find my lost bag of trading items.
The bag should be pretty heavy, and will contain white, cubed objects. Let me know if you find it.
requestCompletedDialogue: You have no idea how much this means to me!
Here is my last remaining bag of kola nuts. I hope it proves useful to you.

missingItem.itemDescription: This seems to be a bag filled with white blocks of salt. Wonder what they're used for!

rewardItem.itemDescription: These seem to be tropical nuts that grow in warm climate.

itemsNeededToProgress.itemDescription: This mysterious stopwatch can be used to travel through portals to the past and future.
This mysterious stopwatch can be used to travel through portals to the past and future.
This mysterious stopwatch can be used to travel through portals to the past and future.

rooms.name: MountEverest
description: You find yourself on a snowy mountain.
Stationed near you, an adult man is scavenging through his temporary campsite.
To the west, you see a portal to a city in the Aztec Empire.
To the north, you see a portal to a trading port in the Mali Empire.
To the east, you see a portal to Menlo Park, New Jersey.

visibleItems.itemDescription: This seems to be some kind of sound device.
This seems to be an initial draft of something called the "Declaration of Independence".

itemRequestDialogue: I have had to stop my ascent up this mountain since I lost some of my equipment.
It's almost impossible to see up here.
Let me know if you find an item that could improve my vision in these conditions.
requestCompletedDialogue: Wow, you're a lifesaver!
I don't have much with me, but here's a snowball I collected that you can use to remember this interaction.

missingItem.itemDescription: These goggles seem sturdier than one would usually find at a department store.

rewardItem.itemDescription: This is just a plain, old ball of snow. I wonder how it hasn't melted yet.

itemsNeededToProgress.itemDescription: This mysterious stopwatch can be used to travel through portals to the past and future.
This mysterious stopwatch can be used to travel through portals to the past and future.
This mysterious stopwatch can be used to travel through portals to the past and future.

rooms.name: AztecEmpire
description: You find yourself in an enormous city, surrounded by large pyramids and sculptures.
Your sudden entrance seems to have garnered the attention of a man at the top of the central pyramid.
To the north, you see a portal to the Viking Era.
To the east, you see a portal to Mount Everest.

visibleItems.itemDescription: This seems to be a masterfully crafted vase of pure gold.
This seems to be a bag filled with white blocks of salt. Wonder what they're used for!

itemRequestDialogue: I order you to find the missing piece of the Aztec Sun Stone.
If you complete this request successfully, you shall retrieve a true symbol of bravery and might.
requestCompletedDialogue: Excellent work. Here is an Aztec warrior mask in return for your valiant effort. Wear it well.

missingItem.itemDescription: This seems to be a small section of a large piece of stone craftwork.

rewardItem.itemDescription: This seems to be a vibrant and colorful mask that somehow fits you perfectly. Who would've thought!

itemsNeededToProgress.itemDescription: This mysterious stopwatch can be used to travel through portals to the past and future.
This mysterious stopwatch can be used to travel through portals to the past and future.

rooms.name: MenloPark
description: You find yourself inside a cluttered workshop.
You hear someone crying from one of the far corners of the workshop.
To the west, you see a portal to Mount Everest.

visibleItems.itemDescription: This gold-encrusted amulet seems very old. How did it end up here?
This seems to be a small section of a large piece of stone craftwork.

itemRequestDialogue: Oh my! I wasn't crying... I was just...
Okay yes I was crying, but you have to understand.
I have been working on this sound machine every waking hour of my life, but I suddenly can't find it.
I would be eternally grateful if you could find me my invention.
requestCompletedDialogue: Thank heavens! I don't have anything good enough to repay you, but here is my sketchbook.
It contains hundreds of designs and is full of unthinkable possibilities. I just know you'll love it!

missingItem.itemDescription: This seems to be some kind of sound device.

rewardItem.itemDescription: This sketchbook contains hundreds of ideas for new machines. The possibilities really are endless.

itemsNeededToProgress.itemDescription: This mysterious stopwatch can be used to travel through portals to the past and future.

rooms.name: RestoredFuture
description: Congratulations! You have successfully restored the missing historical relics to their owners.
The future is now repaired!
